filing_deadlines.complaint: 3 years for personal injury, 6 years for contract disputes
filing_deadlines.answer_to_complaint: 20 days from service of summons and complaint
filing_deadlines.motion_to_dismiss: May be filed with or after answer

discovery_deadlines.depositions: Must be noticed at least 7 days before the deposition date
discovery_deadlines.disclosures: Automatic disclosures required within 120 days of appearance

filing_deadlines.trial_deadlines: Depends on court docket, typically 12-24 months
filing_deadlines.appeal_deadlines: 30 days from notice of entry of judgment

court_procedures.mandatory_arbitration: Cases under $50,000 may be subject to mandatory arbitration

fee_schedule.filing_fee: $210-405 depending on county and case type
fee_schedule.miscellaneous_fees: Varies by county and specific requirements

filing_requirements.document_format: 14-point font minimum for signatures, standard legal formatting
filing_requirements.page_limits: Limited by local rules, typically 10-25 pages for motions
